#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
typedef unsigned long ul;
#define gt(n) scanf("%d",&n)
using namespace std;
int a[1001];
int bit(int n){
    if(n<3)
        return n;
    int t=0,q=n;
    while(1){
        t+=q%2;
        q/=2;
        if(q==0)
            break;
    }
    return t+bit(n-1);
}
int main(){
    int t;
    gt(t);
    while(t--){
        int n;
        gt(n);
        printf("%d\n",bit(n));
    }
    return 0;
}
